Class DatabaseConfigurator

java.lang.Object
  DatabaseConfigurator

public class DatabaseConfigurator
extends java.lang.Object

Handles loading a database configuration from a properties file. Used by the LoginDatabaseHandler class.

Author:
Sophie Engle

Constructor Summary
DatabaseConfigurator()
          Default constructor.
DatabaseConfigurator(java.lang.String filename)
          Will automatically attempt to load database configuration from the provided file.
